article: One Saturday morning, John and his mother went  _  a shoe shop  to buy  John a pair of new shoes. Mrs. Lee put her bag on a chair  _  she looked at some shoes. She could not see  any shoes  she liked and went away. Suddenly she said, "Oh, my bag, someone  _  it away!" All the other people in the shop stopped  _  and looked at her. John ran after the man at once . A few minutes  _  , John came back with  the bag  . He  _  it to his mother. She opened the bag and had a look in  _  . Then she said," Oh, god, nothing is lost."
